name: Blithe Ep 1 - The quiet town
description:
BLITHE - Episode 1
The quiet town

Humanity, faith, fear.

Lingering fragments of an existence that refuses to vanish.
Let me introduce you to this melancholic world.

Meet moody and emotional characters and start betting on the future of a lost mankind.

HOW TO PLAY: 

Mouse Left Click: Navigate, collect, equip and use items

Mouse Right Click: Drop equipped items / Check multiple inventory items.

FEATURES: . 

. Hand drawn backgrounds and animations.

. Immersive atmosphere and moody characters.

. A secret quest that will continue throughout each episode. 

. English and Italian languages.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS: 

No installation needed! Just unzip and enjoy.

IMPORTANT: 

. If you have issues with the mouse speed, you can easily fix it in the Gamesetup located in the same folder which includes the exe.

. Also, you can change the game language and the resolution in the Gamesetup.

AUTHOR COMMENT: 

This game is totally free, but it took a lot of work, time and energy! If you like my ideas/projects/arts, please consider making a donation: you will help me to create more games!

2nd chapter will be released around november/december!
